metadata.Title: CVE-2020-36326 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description: PHPMailer 6.1.8 through 6.4.0 allows object injection through Phar Deserialization via addAttachment with a UNC pathname. NOTE: this is similar to CVE-2018-19296, but arose because 6.1.8 fixed a functionality problem in which UNC pathnames were always considered unreadable by PHPMailer, even in safe contexts. As an unintended side effect, this fix eliminated the code that blocked addAttachment exploitation.

criterions.comment: libphp-phpmailer package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
